source_zh: 忍者升级、升星可大幅度提高忍者属性成长，升级属性加成提高。
target_en: Ninja upgrades and star promotions can greatly improve Ninja Attribute growth, with upgrade Attribute bonuses increasing.

source_zh: 忍者共分为13个星级，只有部分忍者可以突破到13星。
target_en: Ninjas are divided into 13 Star levels, and only certain Ninjas can breakthrough to 13-Star.

source_zh: 除血量、攻击、防御、速度4大基本属性外，还有16个特殊属性。
target_en: In addition to the 4 basic Attributes of HP, Attack, Defense, and Speed, there are also 16 special Attributes.

source_zh: 忍者初始质量从低到高为蓝、紫、橙，分别对应3-5星
target_en: Ninja initial quality ranges from low to high: Blue, Purple, and Orange, corresponding to 3-5 stars respectively.

source_zh: 升星可让部分忍者技能等级可达3级，通过潜能激发可解锁更高等级的技能
target_en: Promoting stars allows some Ninja Skills to reach Level 3, and higher Skill levels can be unlocked through Potential Awakening.

source_zh: 消耗忍者进行合成、突破等操作时，会将之前培养所消耗的资源将返还
target_en: When consuming Ninjas for synthesis, breakthrough, and other operations, resources previously used for their training will be refunded.

source_zh: 技能分为主动和被动。[沉默]阻止主动技能释放
target_en: Skills are divided into Active and Passive. [Silence] prevents Active Skill activation.

source_zh: 忍者升星时会消耗本体忍者，所以在游戏前期需尽量保留本体
target_en: When promoting a Ninja's star level, it consumes the same Ninja unit, so try to keep duplicates of your Ninjas during the early game.

source_zh: 忍者技能冷却分为2回合与4回合，4回合冷却的技能更加强力
target_en: Ninja Skills have cooldowns of 2 turns and 4 turns. Skills with a 4-turn cooldown are more powerful.

source_zh: 阵容克制会极大提高忍者战斗力，具体表现为增加命中和伤害
target_en: Formation advantages greatly increase Ninja combat power, specifically by increasing Hit Rate and damage.

source_zh: 开始追讨叛忍时会自动进行扫荡，扫荡关数为昨日最高通关数-3
target_en: When starting the pursuit of rogue ninjas, auto-sweep will be activated. The sweep level equals yesterday's highest cleared stage minus 3.

source_zh: 每次挑战守卫木叶可选择1次增益buff，如果长时间不操作则系统自动选择
target_en: Each time you challenge the Konoha Guardians, you may select 1 buff. If no action is taken for an extended period, the system will automatically make the selection.

source_zh: 仙人试炼每2天重置1次，所累积的复活币道具不清空
target_en: The Sage Trial resets every 2 days. Accumulated revival tokens will not be cleared.

source_zh: 晓·讨伐战除累积伤害奖励和排名奖励外，还有锦鲤奖抽取
target_en: In addition to cumulative damage rewards and ranking rewards, the Akatsuki Suppression Battle also features a Lucky Draw jackpot prize.

source_zh: 精英召唤进行招募获得的精英召唤积分是稳定兑换心仪忍者的途径之一
target_en: Elite Summon points obtained through Elite Summon recruitment are one of the stable ways to exchange for your desired Ninja.

source_zh: 高级招募每次十连必出5星忍者，并有概率出多位5星忍者
target_en: Advanced Recruitment guarantees a 5-star Ninja every 10-draw, with a chance to obtain multiple 5-star Ninjas.

source_zh: VIP等级达到3以上时，可消耗召唤获得的积分直接抽取5星忍者
target_en: When VIP level reaches 3 or higher, you can consume points obtained from summoning to directly draw 5-star Ninja.

source_zh: 忍者背包格子上限可通过提升VIP等级或消耗金币提升
target_en: Ninja inventory slot limit can be increased by upgrading VIP level or spending Gold.

source_zh: 每一期的轮换活动都会有排名奖励，包含大量金币和高级探宝券
target_en: Each rotation event features ranking rewards, including a large amount of Gold and Advanced Treasure Hunt Tickets.

source_zh: 玩家可消耗金币进行改名，首次改名免费，之后仅需低额金币
target_en: Players can spend Gold to change their name. The first rename is free, and subsequent renames only require a small amount of Gold.

source_zh: 可消耗组织贡献升级六道之力，六道之力可百分比提高忍者属性
target_en: Consume Organization Contribution to upgrade Six Paths Power, which increases Ninja Attributes by a percentage.

source_zh: 布阵中同名忍者无法同时上阵，即使是好友支援的同名忍者
target_en: Ninjas with the same name cannot be deployed simultaneously in formation, even if they are from friend support.

source_zh: 忍者在误操作升星后，可在忍者重生中消耗一定道具全额退回资源
target_en: If a Ninja is accidentally upgraded, you can use the Ninja Rebirth feature to consume certain items and get a full refund of resources.

source_zh: 忍者上阵后，可启动对应阵营的属性增幅，为忍者提高百分比属性
target_en: When a Ninja is deployed, the corresponding faction's Attribute boost is activated, increasing the Ninja's Attributes by a percentage.

source_zh: 在忍传中可获得强力忍道，装备后在战斗中持续为忍者提高属性
target_en: Obtain powerful Ninja Ways in the Ninja Chronicles. Equip them to continuously increase Ninja Attributes during battle.

source_zh: 除竞技场PK外，每周两次的忍者对决竞猜是获得声望的稳定途径
target_en: Besides Arena PvP, the twice-weekly Ninja Showdown betting is a stable way to earn Reputation.

source_zh: 忍者小队的职业组合十分重要，最好能攻击、防御与治疗三者兼备
target_en: The profession combination of a Ninja squad is very important; it's best to have Attack, Defense, and healing all covered.

source_zh: 随着回合数的增加，会开启决战模式，逐渐提高全体忍者伤害
target_en: As the number of rounds increases, Final Battle Mode will activate, gradually increasing all Ninja damage.

source_zh: 不需要的忍者最好不要分解，可以用作主力忍者的升星材料
target_en: Don't decompose unwanted Ninjas; they can be used as star-up materials for your main Ninjas.

source_zh: 有时候非主流阵容代表的并不是不强，而是尚未被搭配与开发
target_en: Sometimes non-meta lineups don't represent weakness—they simply haven't been properly paired and developed yet.
The world's grand trend—if not long-lasting, must turn to Europe!

source_zh: 如果幸福有颜色，那一定是金色
target_en: If happiness had a color, it would surely be gold.
Extreme luck! The RNG gods have blessed you!

source_zh: 感受一下天选之子欧皇的气息
target_en: Feel the aura of the chosen one, the luckiest Ninja alive.

source_zh: 切勿相信任何第三方管道，谨防诈骗！
target_en: Do not trust any third-party channels. Beware of scams!

source_zh: 请勿相信聊天中送兑换码信息，谨防诈骗。
target_en: Do not trust redemption code giveaways in chat—beware of scams.

source_zh: 警惕聊天中发兑换码的诈骗模式！
target_en: Beware of scammers sending redemption codes in chat!

source_zh: 切勿随意通过游戏外聊天申请，不给骗子可乘之机。
target_en: Never accept friend requests through external chat channels carelessly—don't give scammers any opportunity.

source_zh: 切记非官方人员加联系方式的都是诈骗行为！
target_en: Remember: anyone who is not official staff asking to add contact information is a scam!

source_zh: 牢记天上不会掉馅饼，不要相信非官方人员！
target_en: Remember that the sky won't drop pies—don't trust unofficial personnel!

source_zh: 第四次忍界大战，整个忍界破天荒地团结一心，组成忍界联军，为了阻止斑和带土的惊天阴谋而战。几经危难，漩涡鸣人终于站到了敌人的面前。然而，命运的齿轮并未因他和伙伴们的战斗而停歇。传说中的最强禁术——无限月读终于发动，整个忍界都受到影响，坠入了梦境之中。带土曾说，无限月读的世界没有纷争，也没有不幸，所有人都能得到完美的幸福。然而展现在鸣人面前的，却是一个混乱而崩坏的世界！虚假的梦境并不能带来真正的幸福，必须要让大家从无限月读的世界中清醒过来！
target_en: The Fourth Great Ninja War. For the first time in history, the entire ninja world united as one, forming the Allied Shinobi Forces to combat Madara and Obito's earth-shattering conspiracy. After countless perils, Naruto Uzumaki finally stood before his enemies. Yet the gears of fate did not cease turning for him and his comrades. The legendary ultimate forbidden technique—the Infinite Tsukuyomi—was finally unleashed, affecting all of the ninja world and plunging everyone into dreams. Obito once said that in the world of Infinite Tsukuyomi, there would be no conflict, no misfortune, and everyone could attain perfect happiness. But what lay before Naruto was a chaotic, crumbling world! False dreams cannot bring true happiness. He must awaken everyone from the world of Infinite Tsukuyomi!

source_zh: 斑和带土的无限月读刚刚完成，空间还处于十分不稳定的状态，或许趁此机会是有可能打破这个虚假的世界的。但是前来阻挠的敌军不断地发起进攻。曾经惺惺相惜的对手，一起战斗过的挚友，甚至是血浓于水的亲人，竟然都成为了空虚幻影的驱壳，不顾一切地阻止鸣人前进。但是对于一个深处在梦境之中的人来说，或许比起奋不顾身地想要对抗命运，还是放弃挣扎沉醉于梦乡更为“清醒”。
target_en: Madara and Obito's Infinite Tsukuyomi has just been completed, and the space remains in a highly unstable state—perhaps this is an opportunity to break through this false world. However, enemy forces continue to launch their Attack without end. Once-respected rivals, comrades who fought side by side, even blood-bound family—all have become hollow shells of empty illusions, desperately blocking Naruto's advance. Yet for one trapped within a dream, perhaps abandoning struggle to indulge in slumber is more "lucid" than recklessly defying fate.

source_zh: 随着在无限月读的世界中不断深入，鸣人终于在破碎的木叶村中找到了一切的始作俑者——宇智波带土。只需要对记忆完成最后的修正，陷入幻术的所有人都将忘记这是虚幻的世界，永远沉睡在这完美的梦境之中。而带土一直思念的琳，也可以在这个世界中存在，只需要这一个原因，就足以让带土不顾一切地完成这个空前绝后的术。现在阻挡在他面前的，就只剩下鸣人和他的几个伙伴。即便他们选择反抗，带土也愿意为他们赐予安宁的美梦，于是他在梦境中创造出了九喇嘛，要用它的力量对所有人的记忆进行最后的修正。这是鸣人的宿命之战，更是决定忍界命运之战。
target_en: As Naruto delved deeper into the Infinite Tsukuyomi's world, he finally found the mastermind behind everything in the shattered Konoha Village—Obito Uchiha. With just one final correction to their memories, everyone trapped in the genjutsu would forget this was an illusion and sleep forever within this perfect dream. And Rin, whom Obito had always longed for, could exist in this world as well. This reason alone was enough to drive Obito to complete this unprecedented jutsu at any cost. Now only Naruto and his companions stood in his way. Even if they chose to resist, Obito was willing to grant them peaceful dreams, so he created Kurama within the dreamscape to use its power for the final memory correction. This was Naruto's destined battle, and more importantly, a battle that would decide the fate of the Ninja world.

source_zh: 这是一场惊天动地的战斗，鸣人和他的老朋友九喇嘛不得不展开殊死一战，然而最终鸣人失败了。带土的无限月读终于完成，所有人的记忆都被修正。而鸣人也忘记了一切，变回了那个几年前刚从忍者学校毕业的少年。再次与小樱佐助相遇，再次在卡卡西老师的带领之下组成了第七班，再次经历了波之国与再不斩和白惊险的一战。一切又如轮回一般再度重现，然而这不过是一场梦的开端……
target_en: This was an earth-shattering battle. Naruto and his old friend Kurama were forced into a fight to the death, yet in the end, Naruto failed. Obito's Infinite Tsukuyomi was finally complete, and everyone's memories were rewritten. Naruto forgot everything and returned to being the young boy who had just graduated from the Ninja Academy years ago. Once again meeting Sakura and Sasuke, once again forming Team 7 under Kakashi-sensei's leadership, once again experiencing the perilous battle at the Land of Waves against Zabuza and Haku. Everything repeated like a cycle reemerging, yet this was merely the beginning of a dream...

source_zh: 在第七班回到木叶村时，其他村子的忍者们都开始陆续聚集在此。中忍考试即将开始，卡卡西向火影推荐鸣人、佐助、樱三人参加中忍考试，三人对此自信满满。中忍考试正式开始。鸣人虽遇到自己最不擅长的笔试，但为了整个团队，鸣人在几乎是白卷的基础上也没有放弃第十题。最后，鸣人终于通过了考试。
target_en: When Team 7 returned to Konoha, Ninja from other villages began gathering there one after another. The Chunin Exam was about to begin, and Kakashi recommended Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura to the Hokage for participation. The three were full of confidence. The Chunin Exam officially commenced. Although Naruto encountered the written test he was least skilled at, he refused to give up on the tenth question for the sake of his entire team, even with nearly a blank sheet. In the end, Naruto finally passed the exam.

source_zh: 中忍考试第二项测试——死亡森林。这场考核虽名义上是一场生存能力测试，而实际上则是一场不择手段的卷轴争夺战，只有团队共同集齐了天与地卷轴才能顺利通过这场测试。但在考试期间，有一位神秘人变身为鸣人混入第七班，虽然被佐助识破，可三人却并不是神秘人的对手。
target_en: The second test of the Chunin Exams—the Forest of Death. While nominally a survival ability test, this assessment is in reality an unscrupulous scroll battle where only teams that collectively obtain both Heaven and Earth Scrolls can pass. During the exam, a mysterious individual transformed into Naruto to infiltrate Team 7. Although exposed by Sasuke, the three were no match for the mysterious figure.

source_zh: 鸣人与佐助接连对抗神秘人，佐助使用写轮眼操风车三之大刀控制住神秘人，配合火遁龙火之术却只烧掉了神秘人的外皮。神秘人自称为大蛇丸，诱导佐助声称能带给佐助力量，最后在佐助脖子上留下了一个咒印。之后，三人历经阻碍、在伙伴帮助下与磨难后，终于凑齐了卷轴。
target_en: Naruto and Sasuke confronted the mysterious figure one after another. Sasuke used his Sharingan's Manipulated Shuriken Triple Windmill to restrain the mysterious figure, then coordinated with Fire Style: Dragon Flame Jutsu, but only burned away the outer layer of skin. The mysterious figure introduced himself as Orochimaru, tempted Sasuke by claiming he could grant him power, and finally left a Cursed Seal on Sasuke's neck. Afterward, the three overcame obstacles, with the help of their companions and through hardships, finally collected all the scrolls.

source_zh: 抵达终点之塔后，伊鲁卡宣布三人顺利通过了第二场考试。由于通过考试的人数过多，火影在第三场测试前进行了一场预选赛。预选赛采取1V1的方式，胜者晋级。药师兜还未开始便选择弃权。佐助对阵赤胴铠中利用自己创造的体术招式击败了赤胴铠；樱对阵死对头井野，在中招心转之术时被鸣人唤醒，精疲力尽的两人使出最后一击，双方同时倒地导致平局。鸣人对阵牙和赤丸，即使被打得无还手之力也并不放弃，并使用反间计和多重影分身之术打败了赤丸和牙。
target_en: Upon reaching the Final Tower, Iruka announced that the three of them had successfully passed the second exam. Due to the excessive number of qualifiers, the Hokage held a preliminary tournament before the third test. The preliminaries followed a 1v1 format, with winners advancing. Kabuto Yakushi chose to withdraw before his match even began. Sasuke faced off against Aoi Rokushō and defeated him using a self-created taijutsu technique. Sakura battled her rival Ino; when caught by the Mind Body Switch Technique, she was awakened by Naruto's call. Exhausted, both unleashed their final strikes simultaneously, resulting in a double knockout draw. Naruto fought against Kiba and Akamaru; even when beaten to the point of being unable to fight back, he refused to give up, using deception tactics and the Multiple Shadow Clone Technique to defeat both Akamaru and Kiba.

source_zh: 为了备战后续的中忍考试，卡卡西为鸣人物色了一名实力强劲的大色狼惠比寿作为鸣人的老师。由于鸣人不满惠比寿，在自来也打晕因打扰自来也偷窥女浴室的惠比寿后，使用色诱之术让自来也带他修炼。自来也针对鸣人体内拥有强大查克拉的特质，为鸣人设定了专属的修炼方式并使用接近死亡的边缘方式激发鸣人而将其掌握通灵之术。鸣人召唤出蛤蟆老大文太并通过了文太的考验，文太给予鸣人极棒的评价。
target_en: To prepare for the upcoming Chunin Exam, Kakashi found a powerful pervert named Ebisu to be Naruto's teacher. Dissatisfied with Ebisu, Naruto used his Sexy Jutsu on Jiraiya after Jiraiya knocked out Ebisu for interrupting his peeping at the women's bath, convincing Jiraiya to train him instead. Targeting Naruto's Attribute of possessing massive chakra reserves, Jiraiya designed an exclusive training regimen and pushed Naruto to the brink of death to awaken his potential, enabling him to master the Summoning Skill. Naruto summoned Gamabunta the Toad Boss and passed his trial, earning excellent praise from Gamabunta.

source_zh: 在佐助与来自风之国·砂隐村我爱罗的比赛战斗中，佐助使用自己新学会的忍术千鸟并把我爱罗的沙盾贯穿，而我爱罗因此受伤。此时，砂忍突然对木叶忍者发动了攻击，看台上的风影也顺势挟持了火影而大蛇丸手下的音忍也同时释放了四紫炎阵困住了火影。封印阵内，风影露出了真面目，竟然是叛逃木叶的大蛇丸。会场顿时大乱，而我爱罗在砂忍得掩护下撤退，佐助则一路追击我爱罗。
target_en: During the match between Sasuke and Gaara of Sunagakure from the Land of Wind, Sasuke used his newly learned ninjutsu Chidori to pierce through Gaara's sand shield, injuring him. At this moment, the Sand Ninja suddenly launched an Attack on the Konoha Ninja. The Kazekage in the viewing stand took the opportunity to take the Hokage hostage, while Orochimaru's Sound Ninja simultaneously activated the Four Violet Flames Formation to trap the Hokage. Inside the sealing formation, the Kazekage revealed his true identity—he was actually Orochimaru, who had defected from Konoha. The venue immediately fell into chaos. Gaara retreated under the cover of the Sand Ninja, while Sasuke pursued him all the way.

source_zh: 卡卡西告知小樱，这将是波之国以来的A级任务。鸣人，鹿丸、樱和名为帕克的小狗前去追踪佐助并阻止佐助的行动，但他们背后却有音忍在其跟踪。虽然大家听从引路的帕克建议，设置了陷阱阻拦追兵，但是音忍并没有中计。其后，鹿丸以自身为诱饵引开音忍。而鸣人和樱及时赶到，将被大蛇丸咒印缠身的佐助脱离危机。在鸣人的意志下，通灵出蛤蟆老大文太，文太和鸣人合体变身后鸣人一记头槌将我爱罗击败。
target_en: Kakashi informs Sakura that this will be an A-rank mission since the Land of Waves. Naruto, Shikamaru, Sakura, and a small dog named Pakkun set out to track down Sasuke and stop his actions, but they are being followed by Sound Ninja from behind. Although everyone follows Pakkun's guidance and sets traps to block the pursuers, the Sound Ninja do not fall for it. Afterwards, Shikamaru uses himself as bait to lure the Sound Ninja away. Naruto and Sakura arrive in time to rescue Sasuke, who is afflicted by Orochimaru's Cursed Seal. With Naruto's determination, he summons Gamabunta the Toad Boss, and after merging with him in transformation, Naruto defeats Gaara with a single headbutt.

source_zh: 另一边，结界中的火影和大蛇丸进入了激烈的战斗状态。双方不相上下，但在大蛇丸使用秽土转生召唤了一二代目火影后，他们只能被大蛇丸操纵并双双联手向三代目火影攻击。三代目火影随即召唤猿魔对抗，但已力不从心。但在大蛇丸向三代火影展示出利用不死转生而成功侵占肉身的女忍者面孔后，三代火影只能使用当年四代火影封印九尾的忍术“尸鬼封尽”。由于在封印过程被大蛇丸刺伤，最终只封印了大蛇丸的双手。
target_en: Meanwhile, inside the barrier, the Hokage and Orochimaru entered an intense battle. Both sides were evenly matched, but after Orochimaru used Edo Tensei to summon the First and Second Hokage, they could only be manipulated by Orochimaru and jointly Attack the Third Hokage. The Third Hokage immediately summoned Enma to counter, but was already struggling. However, after Orochimaru showed the Third Hokage the face of a female Ninja who had successfully taken over a body using his immortality jutsu, the Third Hokage had no choice but to use the same ninjutsu the Fourth Hokage used to seal the Nine-Tails—the "Dead Demon Consuming Seal." Due to being wounded by Orochimaru during the sealing process, he ultimately only sealed Orochimaru's hands.

source_zh: 为了完成晓组织的最高命令寻找第四代火影的遗产——漩涡鸣人，宇智波鼬带着鬼鲛重返木叶忍者村。阿斯玛和红被安排跟踪监视鼬与鬼鲛的行动，却不料被发现，被打得节节败退。卡卡西及时出现却也因陷入宇智波鼬的万花筒写轮眼而精神涣散，直到迈特凯的相助，鼬和鬼鲛选择撤退继续寻找鸣人。另一边，自来也带着鸣人单独修炼，而佐助得知鼬已出现并在寻找鸣人。然而，鼬比佐助先行找到鸣人并打算强行带走。佐助开启千鸟向鼬发起攻击，鸣人极力释放九尾查克拉但却被鬼鲛的鲛肌吸收。自来也及时出现，并用岩宿蛤蟆食道困住了鼬，但鼬最后使用天照逃脱。
target_en: To carry out the Akatsuki's highest order—locating the Fourth Hokage's legacy, Uzumaki Naruto—Uchiha Itachi returned to Konoha Village with Kisame. Asuma and Kurenai were assigned to track and monitor Itachi and Kisame's movements, but were discovered and forced into retreat. Kakashi arrived in time but fell victim to Itachi's Mangekyo Sharingan, his spirit scattered until Might Guy came to assist, prompting Itachi and Kisame to withdraw and continue their search for Naruto. Meanwhile, Jiraiya took Naruto for solo training, while Sasuke learned of Itachi's appearance and his hunt for Naruto. However, Itachi found Naruto before Sasuke and attempted to take him by force. Sasuke activated Chidori to Attack Itachi, while Naruto desperately released the Nine-Tails' chakra only to have it absorbed by Kisame's Samehada. Jiraiya arrived in time and trapped Itachi using the Toad Mouth Bind, but Itachi ultimately escaped using Amaterasu.

source_zh: 在自来也与鸣人被高层派去将被指派为第五代目火影纲手带回木叶村后，大蛇丸寻找到纲手并想与之交易，而后自来也和鸣人在居酒屋找到了纲手。纲手拒绝成为火影并对自来也下药孤身前见大蛇丸。因最后纲手拒绝大蛇丸而触发了两人恶战。兜代替大蛇丸出战，并利用纲手怕血的弱点封锁纲手的行动。静音与鸣人赶往现场，鸣人为制止兜而不惜受伤，纲手为帮鸣人挡剑克服了对血的恐惧。自来也、纲手、大蛇丸三人之战正式爆发。
target_en: After Jiraiya and Naruto were dispatched by the higher-ups to bring Tsunade, who was to be appointed as the Fifth Hokage, back to Konoha, Orochimaru found Tsunade and sought to make a deal with her. Later, Jiraiya and Naruto located Tsunade at an izakaya. Tsunade refused to become Hokage and drugged Jiraiya before going alone to meet Orochimaru. When Tsunade ultimately rejected Orochimaru, it triggered a fierce battle between them. Kabuto fought in Orochimaru's place and exploited Tsunade's hemophobia to restrict her movements. Shizune and Naruto rushed to the scene, and Naruto sustained injuries to stop Kabuto. To protect Naruto from a sword strike, Tsunade overcame her fear of blood. The battle between Jiraiya, Tsunade, and Orochimaru officially erupted.

source_zh: 鸣人、佐助和樱为探索卡卡西面具下的素颜，决定请卡卡西吃拉面的时候等他揭开面罩，但被井野他们突然出现打断了三人的计划。他们无论集体跟踪还是单独跟踪卡卡西都以失败告终。曾被卡卡西因救助少女而用绳掉在树下的三个忍者想尽办法给卡卡西下药，但也都失败了。佐助建议邀请卡卡西吃日料，泡澡堂都无法揭露卡卡西的模样。最后鸣人、佐助和樱实在没有办法便偷走澡堂内的三个忍者服装，想要与之战斗，却被卡卡西一眼识破。三人直戳了当询问后 ，卡卡西揭开了面罩——面罩之下还是面罩。
target_en: Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura decided to treat Kakashi to ramen in hopes of catching him without his mask when he lifted it to eat, but their plan was interrupted by Ino and the others suddenly appearing. Whether tracking Kakashi as a group or individually, they all ended in failure. Three Ninjas who had once been tied to a tree by Kakashi while he rescued a young woman tried every method to drug him, but failed as well. Sasuke suggested inviting Kakashi for Japanese cuisine and visiting bath houses, yet none could reveal Kakashi's true face. Finally out of options, Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura stole three Ninja outfits from the bath house and attempted to confront him in combat, only to be seen through by Kakashi at a glance. After the trio asked him directly, Kakashi removed his mask—revealing another mask underneath.

source_zh: 得知砂隐的情况，火影派卡卡西组前往救援。鸣人得知我爱罗被晓组织所抓走，紧急前往的路上遇到手鞠，手鞠得知情况后三人渐渐发现背后的阴谋。勘九郎因与蝎对阵而身受毒蚀，小樱作为医疗忍者立刻投入治疗。我爱罗体内的一尾即将被晓组织彻底分离，而千代婆婆加入这场救援。
target_en: Upon learning of Sunagakure's situation, the Hokage dispatched Team Kakashi on a rescue mission. Naruto, upon hearing that Gaara had been captured by the Akatsuki, rushed to aid him and encountered Temari along the way. After learning the circumstances, the three gradually uncovered the conspiracy behind it all. Kankuro had been poisoned during his confrontation with Sasori, and Sakura immediately began treatment as a medical ninja. The One-Tail within Gaara was on the verge of being completely extracted by the Akatsuki, while Granny Chiyo joined the rescue effort.

source_zh: 在前往救援的路上，凯的队伍碰到了鬼鲛，而卡卡西小队碰到了鼬。鬼鲛已经开始向凯发起了攻击，鼬则随时都会向卡卡西他们出手，在千代婆婆的指导下，卡卡西队伍对付鼬有了一些胜算。然而，凯那边夺走了我鬼鲛的鲛肌，但是其他人却陷入了鬼鲛的水牢里。鸣人这边陷入了鼬的幻术之中，鸣人想起自来也的教导，陷入幻术需等待同伴唤醒。可最后卡卡西和凯小组才意识到，与其战斗的其实是替身。
target_en: On the way to the rescue, Guy's team encountered Kisame, while Kakashi's squad ran into Itachi. Kisame had already begun his Attack on Guy, and Itachi was ready to strike against Kakashi's group at any moment. Under Granny Chiyo's guidance, Kakashi's team gained some chance of victory against Itachi. However, on Guy's side, he managed to seize Samehada from Kisame, but the others became trapped in Kisame's Water Prison. Meanwhile, Naruto fell into Itachi's genjutsu. Remembering Jiraiya's teachings—that when caught in a genjutsu, one must wait for their comrades to wake them—Naruto held on. In the end, both Kakashi and Guy's teams realized that they had actually been fighting Shadow Clones all along.

source_zh: 木叶的两组人马还是晚来了一步，晓组织已经顺利完成了一尾和人柱力之间的分离。我爱罗只剩下一副冰冷的躯壳，鸣人失理智的追逐带走我爱罗的迪克拉，而卡卡西跟随鸣人，凯、天天、宁次和小李要打败和自己一模一样的敌人，而小樱和千代婆婆留在基地里对付蝎，而蝎总算是被打败了，他在临死前将大蛇丸的所在地点告诉给了小樱。凯班成员仍陷入苦战之中。
target_en: Konoha's two teams arrived too late—the Akatsuki had already successfully extracted the One-Tail from its Jinchuriki. Gaara was left as nothing but a cold, empty shell. An enraged Naruto gave chase to Deidara, who had taken Gaara's body, with Kakashi following close behind. Meanwhile, Guy, Tenten, Neji, and Lee were forced to battle enemies identical to themselves, while Sakura and Granny Chiyo remained at the base to confront Sasori. Sasori was finally defeated, and with his dying breath, he revealed Orochimaru's location to Sakura. The members of Team Guy remained locked in their desperate struggle.

source_zh: 迪达拉自爆，鸣人与卡卡西夺回了我爱罗。由于我爱罗的死亡刺激了鸣人，他开启了九尾的力量，在身体外围形成了妖狐之衣，而愤怒使鸣人冲昏了头脑，他开始无差别进行攻击。而幸好自来也提前预料鸣人可能会暴走而将一张符咒交给了卡卡西，使用符咒后，鸣人恢复了原样。我爱罗在小樱的诊断下已经死了，可是千代婆婆对我爱罗使用了转生术，整个砂忍村的人们都来救我爱罗，我爱罗苏醒，千代婆婆却永远的离开了。
target_en: Deidara self-destructed, and Naruto and Kakashi retrieved Gaara. Gaara's death enraged Naruto, triggering the Nine-Tails' power and forming a Demon Fox Cloak around his body. Blinded by fury, Naruto began attacking indiscriminately. Fortunately, Jiraiya had anticipated this rampage and given Kakashi a sealing tag beforehand; using it, Naruto returned to normal. Sakura's diagnosis confirmed Gaara was dead, but Chiyo used her Reincarnation Ninjutsu on him—the entire Sand Ninja Village came to save their Kage. Gaara awakened, but Chiyo departed forever.

source_zh: 因卡卡西受伤，卡卡西班成员加入了一名木叶暗部特殊部队“根”的忍者佐井，由大和队长带队。大和队长通过装扮蝎与线人药师兜碰面，大蛇丸却现身。一场恶战即将开始。鸣人已控制不住自己的情绪，瞬间被妖狐之衣包裹，向大蛇丸发起进攻，而兜此时却完全不是鸣人的对手，被九尾力量吞噬的鸣人变得异常可怕，但大蛇丸却毫无优势，就在陷入苦战之时，鸣人被大蛇丸击败，鸣人丧失了意识。
target_en: Due to Kakashi's injury, Sai—a Ninja from Konoha's ANBU special force "Root"—joined Team Kakashi, led by Captain Yamato. Captain Yamato disguised himself as Sasori to meet with informant Kabuto Yakushi, but Orochimaru appeared instead. A fierce battle was about to begin. Naruto could no longer control his emotions and was instantly enveloped by the Demon Fox Cloak, launching an Attack against Orochimaru. At this moment, Kabuto was completely no match for Naruto. Consumed by the Nine-Tails' power, Naruto became exceptionally terrifying, yet Orochimaru held no advantage. Just as the battle reached a stalemate, Naruto was defeated by Orochimaru and lost consciousness.

source_zh: 大和队长三人得知佐井的计划后，抓住了佐井。为了他们之间的羁绊鸣人不惜与大蛇丸作对也要找到佐助。他们一间间打开大蛇丸基地的房间，但此时大蛇丸出现了。大和队长在佐井的背包里找到了暗杀的名册，而佐助却在暗杀列表中。但在佐井发现了佐助后，却执意带他回木叶村，时隔三年，佐助、小樱、鸣人终于相见。
target_en: Captain Yamato's team captured Sai after learning of his plan. Determined by their bonds, Naruto defied Orochimaru to find Sasuke. They searched room by room through Orochimaru's base, but Orochimaru appeared. Captain Yamato found an assassination list in Sai's backpack—with Sasuke on it. Yet when Sai discovered Sasuke, he insisted on bringing him back to Konoha. After three years, Sasuke, Sakura, and Naruto finally reunited.

source_zh: 鸣人被纲手分配的D级任务而不得不中断修炼。任务是由火之国附近的火之寺委托的，属于寺院的墓以及南真、西户、东宇和北音墓被盗墓贼盗取，大和他们需查明盗墓贼的身份。而在大和队长一行人分头寻找火之寺的领路人时，鸣人误打误撞发现了隐藏坟墓并偶遇了空。大和怀疑被偷走的墓会被拿去另有用途也许与团藏有关，此事对于地陆大师和阿斯玛而言，是曾为守护士十二忍的伙伴墓被盗。毫无戒备之心的鸣人和空陷入敌人的圈套，而眼睁睁看着棺木从眼前消失。
target_en: Naruto was forced to interrupt his training due to a D-rank mission assigned by Tsunade. The mission, commissioned by the Fire Temple near the Land of Fire, involved investigating the desecration of the temple's cemetery and the tombs of Nanzen, Seiko, To'u, and Hokuin by grave robbers. Team Yamato needed to identify the culprits. While the team split up to find a guide from the Fire Temple, Naruto stumbled upon a hidden grave and encountered Sora by chance. Yamato suspected the stolen graves might be used for another purpose, possibly connected to Danzo. For Master Chiriku and Asuma, this was deeply personal—these were the resting places of their former comrades from the Twelve Guardian Ninja. With their guard down, Naruto and Sora fell into an enemy trap, helplessly watching as the coffins vanished before their eyes.

source_zh: 在暗部将团藏抓住并绑回木叶后，空在偷窥火影审讯时被暗部发现。而空从阿斯玛口中知道了父亲死亡的真相。随后，空袭击火影未遂而逃走时，木叶忍者村陷入了危机。入侵者利用土遁的最高境界创生之术将亡魂们苏醒，木叶忍者村开启第一戒备状态。在鸣人追寻空之时，阿斯玛则面对着死去的南真、西户、东宇和北音曾经的伙伴，而风户、风焰和风贺也坚守着自己的阵地。
target_en: After the ANBU captured Danzo and brought him back to Konoha, Sora was discovered by the ANBU while spying on the Hokage's interrogation. Sora learned the truth about his father's death from Asuma. Subsequently, when Sora attempted to attack the Hokage but failed and fled, Konohagakure fell into crisis. The invaders used the ultimate Earth Style technique of creation to resurrect the dead souls, and Konohagakure entered its first state of alert. While Naruto pursued Sora, Asuma faced his former comrades—Minami, Nishito, Toiu, and Kitane—while Kazuma, Fuka, and Fuen held their ground.

据第五代火影所收的委托中，鸣人、佐助和樱三人被分配了B级任务——前往茶之国保护重要人士。三人需帮助山葵一家赢得四年一次轰大社的祭拜仪式中的赛跑比赛，让次郎长老大重获小镇主权。在得知保护对象为刚对三人挑衅并搭讪小樱的飞毛腿森乃伊驮天时，鸣人非常气愤。赛跑比赛开始，伊驮天并未按原有的路线走，他另辟蹊径但被和芥一家聘请的忍者埋伏下并不顺利。三人为此战斗，而绿青葵的出现彻底破坏了伊驮天的计划。鸣人鼓励伊驮天振作起来并背着他跑上了神社，绿青葵依旧出现伊驮天面前挑衅并破坏考试路径，三人努力抵抗下，鸣人在最后关头一记螺旋丸打破了雷电之剑。伊驮天不负众望跑向终点赢得了比赛。
target_en: According to a request accepted by the Fifth Hokage, Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura were assigned a B-rank mission—to escort an important person to the Land of Tea. The three needed to help the Wasabi family win the race at the ceremonial festival held once every four years at the Gōdaimyōjin Shrine, allowing Elder Jirōchō to regain control of the town. Upon learning that their protection target was Idaten Morino, the speedster who had just provoked them and hit on Sakura, Naruto was furious. When the race began, Idaten did not follow the original route; he took a shortcut but was ambushed by Ninja hired by the Wagarashi family, making things difficult. The three fought for this reason, and the appearance of Midori Aoi completely ruined Idaten's plans. Naruto encouraged Idaten to pull himself together and carried him on his back up to the shrine. Midori Aoi still appeared before Idaten to provoke him and destroy the exam path. Under the trio's desperate resistance, Naruto used a Rasengan at the last moment to shatter the Sword of Thunder. Idaten lived up to expectations and ran to the finish line, winning the race.

source_zh: 佐助因无法释怀在前屡次战斗中是鸣人释放力量解决了战斗，而自己却无法做到而心中愤恨提出与鸣人一战。鸣人应战，两人前往天台。在两人打的不相上下，而鸣人凝聚了螺旋丸，佐助开启飞鸟即将相互碰撞之时，卡卡西及时将两人抛开，争锋被迫停止。
target_en: Unable to let go of his resentment that Naruto had unleashed his power to resolve battles time and again while he himself could not, Sasuke challenged Naruto to a fight. Naruto accepted, and the two headed to the rooftop. As they fought evenly matched, with Naruto forming a Rasengan and Sasuke activating Chidori about to clash, Kakashi intervened in time to separate them, forcing the confrontation to a halt.

source_zh: 佐助在看到鸣人用螺旋丸打出的巨大缺口后，佐助意识到鸣人已越来越强。佐助在陷入回忆中鼬言语的不断刺激下愈加憎恨自己力量不够，却被突然出现卡卡西绑在了树下，与佐助进行了谈话，他们有不同的不幸但是如今又有着相同的幸运。夜晚，音忍出现包围了佐助并控制了他，在咒印的影响和音忍言语的讽刺，佐助背上行囊前往大蛇丸之处离开木叶走上了决心复仇的路。
target_en: After witnessing the massive crater Naruto created with his Rasengan, Sasuke realized Naruto was growing stronger. Tormented by memories of Itachi's words and consumed by self-loathing at his own weakness, Sasuke was suddenly bound to a tree by Kakashi, who confronted him with a conversation about how they shared different past misfortunes but now possessed the same fortune. That night, Sound Ninja appeared, surrounded Sasuke, and manipulated him. Under the influence of the Cursed Seal and provoked by the Sound Ninja's taunts, Sasuke packed his belongings and departed for Orochimaru's location, leaving Konoha behind to walk the path of vengeance.

source_zh: 第五代火影纲手给鹿丸下达了第一个中忍任务——带回佐助。鹿丸召集鸣人、丁次、犬冢牙、宁次四人前往追回佐助。佐助为了使咒印的力量增强，吞下醒心丸，呈现假死状态。音忍们把佐助放进棺材，并下了封印，运往大蛇丸的处所。由于鸣人五人的意图提前被音忍察觉而被次郎坊的法术关在土壁的结界中。五人突破结界后，丁次留下对阵次郎坊。在追击到音忍过程中发现，鸣人和鹿丸被鬼同丸的忍术“蜘蛛束缚术”抓住。宁次与鬼同丸上演了拉锯战。
target_en: The Fifth Hokage Tsunade assigned Shikamaru his first Chunin mission—retrieve Sasuke. Shikamaru gathered Naruto, Choji, Kiba, and Neji to pursue Sasuke. To enhance the power of his Cursed Seal, Sasuke swallowed the Mind Awakening Pill and entered a death-like state. The Sound Ninja placed Sasuke in a coffin, sealed it, and transported him to Orochimaru's location. Because the five were detected by the Sound Ninja beforehand, they were trapped inside an earthen barrier created by Jirobo's technique. After breaking through the barrier, Choji stayed behind to face Jirobo. During the pursuit, Naruto and Shikamaru were caught by Kidomaru's Skill "Spider Bind." Neji engaged in a back-and-forth battle with Kidomaru.

source_zh: 大战结束后，五人设法夺回了佐助，却被左近和多由也紧随其后。牙、赤丸左近因陷阱跌入谷底，鹿丸被多由也困住，鸣人与君麻吕陷入苦战之中，李的帮助并未出现转机，牙则深受重伤带着赤丸逃走了，而佐助醒来即将离开。李把酒当药误拿后，醉拳对抗君麻吕、鸣人则前往追已跑掉的佐助。就在三人陷入危险之际时，木叶同盟国——砂之忍者出现了。三人以力挽狂澜之式解决了对手。
target_en: After the great battle, the five managed to reclaim Sasuke, only to be pursued by Sakon and Tayuya. Kiba and Akamaru fell into a ravine due to Sakon's trap, Shikamaru was trapped by Tayuya, and Naruto found himself in a desperate fight against Kimimaro—Lee's assistance failed to turn the tide, while Kiba fled with severe injuries carrying Akamaru, and Sasuke was about to awaken and leave. After Lee mistakenly grabbed sake instead of medicine, he used Drunken Fist against Kimimaro while Naruto chased after the fleeing Sasuke. Just as the three found themselves in mortal danger, an ally from Konoha—the Sand Ninja arrived. The three turned the tide and defeated their opponents with overwhelming force.

source_zh: 鸣人追逐佐助到终结之谷，两人相对。鸣人无法接受佐助的冷漠态度，冲向佐助。两人在终结谷展开生死之战。鸣人的螺旋丸与佐助的飞鸟终于相击，鸣人终于相信佐助是真的想杀死自己，鸣人封印的九尾被启动，两佐助启动了大蛇丸的咒印。两人激战许久，最后鸣人败，佐助离开。
target_en: Naruto chased Sasuke to the Valley of the End, where the two faced each other. Unable to accept Sasuke's cold attitude, Naruto charged at him. The two engaged in a life-or-death battle at the Valley of the End. When Naruto's Rasengan and Sasuke's Chidori finally clashed, Naruto finally believed that Sasuke truly intended to kill him. Naruto's sealed Nine-Tails was activated, while Sasuke activated Orochimaru's Cursed Seal. The two fought fiercely for a long time, until Naruto was ultimately defeated and Sasuke departed.

source_zh: 自来也带领小樱和鸣人前往田园之国的音隐村带回佐助，由于自来也好色毛病犯了而意外得知大蛇丸的消息。鸣人和小樱路遇笹目被音忍袭击，两人得知笹目需去大蛇丸基地寻找堂哥风魔岚下落。但笹目却因被音忍诱骗而背叛了他们，在茶水动手脚，但三人早已看穿了计谋，并打退了音忍三人。笹目将自来也等人带到了大蛇丸的老巢，但他们因兵分三路，需各自克服接下来的陷阱。而在小樱、鸣人笹目陷入危机时，自来也及时出现，小樱和鸣人得救。
target_en: Jiraiya leads Sakura and Naruto to the Hidden Sound Village in the Land of Rice Fields to retrieve Sasuke. Due to Jiraiya's perverted tendencies acting up, they unexpectedly learn information about Orochimaru. Naruto and Sakura encounter Sasame being attacked by Sound Ninja, and the two learn that Sasame needs to go to Orochimaru's base to find her cousin Kazuma Arashi. However, Sasame betrays them after being deceived by the Sound Ninja, tampering with their tea, but the three had already seen through the scheme and repelled the three Sound Ninja. Sasame brings Jiraiya and the others to Orochimaru's lair, but because they split into three groups, each must overcome the traps ahead. When Sakura, Naruto, and Sasame fall into crisis, Jiraiya appears in time to save Sakura and Naruto.

source_zh: 当纲手意识到水木似乎与大蛇丸有关联、派阿斯玛和红到木叶重刑间审讯水木，却囚犯们受水木的教唆对他们发起攻击。待鸣人赶到现场，发现看守也已倒地。另一边静音带着豚豚找到水木踪迹，因被雷神风神兄弟打败，豚豚回到村里报知火影，鸣人无意知晓后与伊鲁卡前往支援。可水木对于伊鲁卡的苦口婆心并未动摇，鹿丸的及时赶到控制了风神雷神的人行动。伊鲁卡与水木作战后，水木的未婚妻椿出现了。因为椿的加入，伊鲁卡和鸣人发现了水木越狱的真正原因——水木想到得到大蛇丸的力量。
target_en: When Tsunade realized that Mizuki seemed to have connections with Orochimaru, she sent Asuma and Kurenai to Konoha's Strict Correctional Facility to interrogate him. However, the prisoners were incited by Mizuki to Attack them. When Naruto arrived at the scene, he found the guards had already fallen. Meanwhile, Shizune, accompanied by Tonton, tracked down Mizuki's whereabouts but was defeated by the Raijin and Fujin brothers. Tonton returned to the village to inform the Hokage, and after Naruto unintentionally learned of this, he headed to provide support with Iruka. But Mizuki remained unmoved by Iruka's earnest persuasion, until Shikamaru's timely arrival restrained the actions of Fujin and Raijin. After Iruka battled Mizuki, Mizuki's fiancée Tsubaki appeared. Due to Tsubaki's involvement, Iruka and Naruto discovered the true reason behind Mizuki's prison break—Mizuki sought to obtain Orochimaru's power.

source_zh: 木叶丸他们终于成为了可以执行任务的小组，而鸣人与自来也的修行终于结束回到了木叶村。为了测试鸣人的修行成果，火影特地安排了卡卡西来和鸣人小樱对决。这回的试炼还是从卡卡西身上抢夺铃铛，并使用了写轮眼，以前同样的方法都已不奏效。鸣人的进步极大，小樱怪力也变更强，鸣人想使用千年杀报复回卡卡西却失败了，最后鸣人和小樱顺利的摘到了卡卡西身上的铃铛。
target_en: Konohamaru and his team have finally become a squad capable of taking on missions, while Naruto's training with Jiraiya has ended and he returns to the Hidden Leaf Village. To test the results of Naruto's training, the Hokage specially arranged for Kakashi to face off against Naruto and Sakura. This trial once again involves snatching the bells from Kakashi, who uses his Sharingan—none of their old tactics work anymore. Naruto has improved tremendously, and Sakura's monstrous strength has grown even stronger. Naruto attempts to get back at Kakashi with the Thousand Years of Death but fails. In the end, Naruto and Sakura successfully take the bells from Kakashi.

source_zh: 砂隐村遭到了晓的攻击，整个村子外围的士兵都被晓的两个成员杀光了。而砂隐村即将陷入空前的危机中。在空中降落的晓组织成员迪达拉被我爱罗发现，此时我爱罗已成为风影，却对善于爆破的迪达拉无从下手。于此同时，砂隐陷入了战争中，迪达拉的炸弹在村子中引爆，我爱罗用自己的沙子为整个村庄建立了一个屏障，但却被迪达拉炸弹炸伤。我爱罗落入了迪达拉手中。
target_en: The Hidden Sand Village was attacked by the Akatsuki, and all the soldiers on the outskirts of the village were killed by two members of the Akatsuki. The Hidden Sand Village was about to fall into an unprecedented crisis. Deidara, an Akatsuki member descending from the sky, was discovered by Gaara, who had already become the Kazekage, yet found himself at a loss against the explosion-wielding Deidara. At the same time, the Hidden Sand fell into war as Deidara's bombs detonated throughout the village. Gaara used his sand to create a barrier for the entire village, but was injured by Deidara's explosions. Gaara fell into Deidara's hands.

source_zh: 妙木山隐之里的蛤蟆龙，喜欢零食的可爱小蛤蟆。与哥哥蛤蟆吉不同，作为蛤蟆老大文太的次子，龙似乎并没有从他那里继承到太多才能，反而时常因为迟钝和缺乏危机感而陷入危险之中。过于天然的性格或许让他并不适合成为一名优秀的战士，但他却并非毫无战斗力，他能够与鸣人配合使用风遁·蛤蟆铁炮等仙术。若是他能够认真起来，也是相当可靠的存在。
target_en: Gamakichi of Mount Myoboku's Hidden Village, an adorable little toad with a love for snacks. Unlike his older brother Gamatatsu, as the second son of the great toad boss Gamabunta, Ryu seems to have inherited little talent from his father, often finding himself in danger due to his sluggishness and lack of crisis awareness. His overly naive personality may make him unsuitable to be an excellent warrior, but he is not without combat capability—he can coordinate with Naruto to use Wind Style: Toad Gun and other Sage Techniques. If he could get serious, he would be quite a reliable presence.

source_zh: 卡卡西的通灵兽八忍犬之首。虽说在八忍犬中帕克的战斗力可能是最为弱小的，但它出色的头脑，让他足以担任忍犬的领头。帕克不但精通人类语言，还能与其他动物沟通，收集情报。配合他本身惊人的嗅觉帕克十分擅长追踪搜寻。曾在追回佐助一战中帮助木叶下忍们找到音忍逃离的路线，还能察觉敌人的埋伏帮助小队脱险。有帕克在，无论进行什么任务都能多一份安心。
target_en: The head of Kakashi's eight Ninken. Though Pakkun may be the weakest in terms of combat power among the eight Ninja Hounds, his exceptional intellect makes him more than qualified to lead them. Pakkun not only understands human language but can also communicate with other animals to gather intelligence. Combined with his remarkable sense of smell, he excels at tracking and searching. During the mission to retrieve Sasuke, he helped the Leaf Genin locate the Sound Ninja's escape route and detected enemy ambushes to help the team avoid danger. With Pakkun around, any mission becomes that much more reassuring.

source_zh: 居住在妙木山隐之里的蛤蟆文太，体内存有极为强大的仙术查克拉。被鸣人称为「蛤蟆老大」，时常嘴上叼着一根烟斗，以腰间的配刀作战。在忍界大战中被自来也通灵出来，和大蛇丸通灵的万蛇，纲手通灵的蛞蝓一起屡立战功。文太也因此成为了“三忍”之一自来也的代表象征之一。忍界大战之后他的左眼留下了一道深深的疤痕，却是更凸显他的老大气质。后与波风水门、漩涡鸣人都曾达成通灵契约。
target_en: Gamabunta, the toad who resides in the Hidden Village of Mount Myoboku, possesses extremely powerful Senjutsu chakra within his body. Referred to by Naruto as "Boss Toad," he is often seen with a pipe in his mouth and fights using the sword at his waist. During the Ninja World War, he was summoned by Jiraiya alongside Orochimaru's Manda and Tsunade's Katsuyu, achieving numerous military exploits together. Gamabunta thus became one of the representative symbols of Jiraiya, one of the "Three Ninja." After the war, a deep scar remained over his left eye, which only further highlighted his boss-like demeanor. He later formed summoning contracts with both Minato Namikaze and Naruto Uzumaki.

source_zh: 居住在妙木山隐之里的蛤蟆健，是传说中的蛤蟆老大文太的兄弟。蛤蟆健有着极为独特的紫红色皮肤，同时脸上还有极具个性的U型黑色纹身。它所常用的武器是布满棱刺的鱼叉以及锅盖型的铁之大盾。蛤蟆健的性格低调沉稳，常说自己十分愚，实则十分坚忍，且心思细腻，能与搭档的通灵者完成完美的配合。擅长防御的他总能给人安心的感觉，曾在与佩恩的一战中又不俗的表现，受到自来也的夸赞。
target_en: Gama Ken, who resides in the Hidden Village of Mount Myōboku, is the brother of the legendary toad boss Gama Bunta. This toad possesses uniquely distinctive purple-red skin and a highly individualistic U-shaped black tattoo on his face. His commonly used weapons are a pronged harpoon covered in spikes and a large pot-lid-shaped iron shield. Gama Ken has a low-key and steady personality, often claiming himself to be quite foolish, yet he is actually extremely persevering and meticulous in thought, capable of achieving perfect coordination with his summoning partner. Specializing in Defense, he always gives people a sense of security. He had remarkable performance during the battle against Pain and received praise from Jiraiya.

source_zh: 居住在妙木山隐之里的蛤蟆广，是传说中的蛤蟆老大文太的兄弟。蛤蟆广身手敏捷，擅长使用背后的两把长剑战斗，是妙木山数一数二的剑术高手。性格上比较固执，平时沉默寡言，把大部分的心思都花在修炼之上，因此他不但剑术了得，在仙术的运用上也十分纯熟。曾在与绝的对战中使出通灵·屋台崩坏之术将对手压制。在与佩恩的战斗中也有非常出色的表现。
target_en: Gamabunta of Mount Myoboku's Hidden Village, brother to the legendary toad boss Gamabunta. A nimble fighter, Gamabunta wields two long swords strapped to his back, ranking among Mount Myoboku's finest swordsmen. Stubborn by nature and usually taciturn, he devotes most of his energy to training—making him not only a master of the blade but also highly proficient in Sage Art techniques. During his battle against Zetsu, he subdued his opponent with the Summoning: Toad Shop Demolition Skill. He also delivered an outstanding performance in the fight against Pain.

source_zh: 来自猿魔一族的猿猴王·猿魔，三代火影的通灵兽，大蛇丸称其为最强的通灵兽。猿魔不仅能说话，同时自身还拥有查克拉，能够独立释放忍术和变形，拥有金刚不坏之躯，可变身为金刚如意棒，在战斗中作为武器为三代所用，伸缩自如变换万千。在大蛇丸实施木叶崩溃计划时与三代联手对抗大蛇丸以及他的历代火影秽土转生军团，最后力救三代取得惨胜。
target_en: Enma, the Monkey King from the Sarugami clan and summoning creature of the Third Hokage, whom Orochimaru called the strongest summoning beast. Enma can not only speak but also possesses his own chakra, allowing him to independently perform ninjutsu and transform. With an indestructible diamond-hard body, he can transform into the Adamantine Staff—a weapon wielded by the Third Hokage in battle, capable of extending, contracting, and changing form at will. During Orochimaru's Konoha Crush plan, he joined forces with the Third Hokage to fight against Orochimaru and his reanimated former Hokage army, ultimately saving the Third Hokage at great cost to secure a pyrrhic victory.

source_zh: 潜伏于地龙洞隐之里的初代万蛇，支配地下世界的隐密之王！万蛇的体型巨大，速度却异常迅捷，攻击力惊人。在忍界大战中被大蛇丸召唤出来，与自来也的文太，纲手的蛞蝓一起屡立战功，可以说他们三人能被称为“传说三忍”都离不开这三头强力通灵兽的帮助。万蛇的性格极其傲慢嗜血，据说每次被大蛇丸召唤都会要求其献上100人的活祭作贡品。强大的同时也是邪恶的化身。
target_en: Lurking in the hidden village of Ryūchi Cave, the First Manda, King of Secrets who rules the underground world! Despite his massive size, Manda possesses extraordinary speed and devastating Attack power. Summoned by Orochimaru during the Ninja World War, he fought alongside Jiraiya's Gamabunta and Tsunade's Katsuyu, earning great military merits—it could be said that the three of them being called the "Legendary Sannin" would not have been possible without the aid of these three powerful summoning beasts. Manda's nature is extremely arrogant and bloodthirsty; it is said that every time he is summoned by Orochimaru, he demands a living sacrifice of 100 people as tribute. Great power incarnate, yet also the embodiment of evil.

source_zh: 从湿骨林祖师蛞蝓仙人身体中分出的分裂体。因为具有分裂的能力，成群结队出现的它们通常很难被人分清彼此，所以多以「蛞蝓」统称，但被纲手通灵出来的蛞蝓真名其实是「活蝓」。忍界大战中与蛤蟆文太，万蛇一起助力三忍驰骋沙场屡立战功。其能力可以大量分裂后附着在伤者身上进行大规模的治疗，属于后勤部队的同时其使用的酸液攻击同样杀伤力不容小觑。只是性格温柔的活蝓很少主动展开攻击，相比之下它更希望能够为人治愈伤口，抚平疼痛。
target_en: A fission body separated from the body of Slug Sage, the founder of Shikkotsu Forest. Due to their ability to split and multiply, they typically appear in swarms that are difficult to distinguish from one another, so they are generally referred to simply as "Slugs." However, the true name of the slug summoned by Tsunade is actually "Katsuyu." During the Ninja World War, it fought alongside Gamabunta and Manda, helping the Legendary Sannin achieve numerous military exploits on the battlefield. Its ability to massively split and attach itself to wounded soldiers for large-scale healing makes it part of the logistics force, while its acid Attack is equally formidable. However, due to its gentle nature, Katsuyu rarely initiates attacks on its own—instead, it prefers to heal wounds and ease pain for others.

source_zh: 佩恩六道当中畜生道所使用的众多通灵兽之一，也是最为特殊的一个。与畜生道其他攻击能力惊人的通灵兽不同，石熊猫只有单纯的防御能力。然而其坚硬的石质皮肤在防御方面却是能与传说中的尾兽守鹤相媲美。任何常规的忍术都不可能击破它的防御，因此毫无进攻能力的它才会被
target_en: One of the many Summoning Beasts used by the Animal Path among Pain's Six Paths, and also the most unique one. Unlike other Summoning Beasts of the Animal Path with astonishing Attack capabilities, the Stone Panda possesses only simple Defense abilities. However, its hard stone skin in terms of Defense can rival the legendary Tailed Beast Shukaku. No conventional Ninjutsu could break through its Defense, which is why this creature with no offensive capability was

source_zh: 妙木山的长老之一，大蛤蟆仙人的得力亲信，同时也是传授自来也仙法的恩师。因为修炼仙法而与自然达成了共生，已经活了800多年之久。在自来也作战时会被通灵到其肩膀上作为仙法发动的辅助者，也因此受到限制很少直接出手，但认真起来的时候能使出各种强力的仙法。而身为妙木山长老的他也被隐之里的一众强者尊称为「头儿」，可见其人望之高。
target_en: One of the elders of Mount Myoboku, a trusted confidant of the Great Toad Sage, and the mentor who taught Jiraiya Sage Arts. Having achieved symbiosis with nature through Sage Art training, he has lived for over 800 years. During Jiraiya's battles, he is summoned to his shoulders to assist in activating Sage Arts, which limits him from taking direct action; however, when serious, he can unleash various powerful Sage Arts. As an elder of Mount Myoboku, he is also respectfully addressed as "Boss" by many strong Ninja of the Hidden Village, demonstrating his immense prestige.

source_zh: 妙木山的长老之一，大蛤蟆仙人的得力亲信，自来也仙法恩师深作的妻子。平时的职责主要负责筛选可以进入妙木山学习仙法的人。在自来也战斗是会和深作一同被通灵到其肩膀上作为仙法发动的辅助者，同时也能施展各种出神入化的仙术进行战斗。比起长老的身份，志麻更想成为一名普通的家庭主妇。它喜爱料理，虽然鸣人并不喜欢……刀子嘴豆腐心的它也经常会给身边的人许多有用的建议，因此在妙木山的众多强者之中非常有威望。
target_en: One of the elders of Mount Myoboku and a trusted confidant of the Great Toad Sage, the wife of Fukasaku—Jiraiya's master in Senjutsu. Her usual duty involves screening those who may enter Mount Myoboku to learn Senjutsu. During Jiraiya's battles, she would be summoned alongside Fukasaku to his shoulders to assist in activating Senjutsu, while also being capable of wielding various masterful Sage Art techniques in combat. More than her status as an elder, Shima wishes to be an ordinary housewife. She loves cooking, though Naruto doesn't particularly enjoy it... Sharp-tongued yet soft-hearted, she often gives useful advice to those around her, earning her considerable respect among the many powerful beings of Mount Myoboku.

source_zh: 雨隐村前任首领山椒鱼半藏的通灵兽。是与那个被称为半神的男人比肩，站在忍界大战顶峰的传奇忍兽。山椒鱼能喷吐大范围的毒雾，笼罩整个战场。身中山椒鱼之毒若是自身实力较弱便会当场毙命，即便是影级强者也很可能会失去战斗能力。可以说半藏能威震忍界，山椒鱼的实力有着很大的功劳。而山椒鱼作为远古的生物，即便是对上传说中的尾兽也有一战之力。
target_en: The summoning creature of Hanzo the Salamander, former leader of Amegakure. A legendary ninja beast that stood shoulder-to-shoulder with the man known as the Demigod, reaching the pinnacle of the Ninja World Wars. The salamander can spew forth large-scale poison mist, enveloping the entire battlefield. Those afflicted by its venom will perish on the spot if their strength is lacking, and even Kage-level powerhouses may lose their combat ability. It can be said that Hanzo's fearsome reputation throughout the ninja world owes much to the salamander's might. As a primordial creature, the salamander possesses the power to contend even against the legendary Tailed Beasts.

source_zh: 为了获胜我将不择手段
target_en: I'll do whatever it takes to win.

source_zh: 为了自己的理想，我有信心在任何战斗中获胜
target_en: For my ideals, I have the confidence to win any battle.

source_zh: 不能只是受人保护！我也得好好战斗才行！
target_en: I can't just be protected by others! I need to fight properly too!

source_zh: 好~得让无聊的争斗快点结束才行！
target_en: Alright~ I need to end this boring fight quickly!

source_zh: 接下来就是超水平的战斗了..！
target_en: Next up is a battle beyond our level..!

source_zh: 喔..竟敢向我挑战啊..那我就享受一阵子吧
target_en: Oh... daring to challenge me, huh? Then I'll enjoy this for a while.
Heh heh! Let me enjoy this!

source_zh: 你的坟上该插哪一种花呢~？
target_en: What kind of flower should I plant on your grave~?

source_zh: 靠我的魅力来一击必杀！

target_en: I absolutely... I definitely won't lose...!

source_zh: 就让你瞧瞧！女人的执着！和少女的心！
target_en: I'll show you! A woman's determination! And a maiden's heart!

source_zh: 开什么玩笑啊~！！（这句有点嘶哑，不是很好听，最好别配置了···）
target_en: What a joke~!! (This line is a bit hoarse and doesn't sound very good, better not to configure it...)

source_zh: 就让你见识一下...我认真的模样吧...！
target_en: Now witness... the true extent of my power...!

source_zh: 不准放水！请认真地跟我打一场吧！
target_en: Don't hold back! Please fight me seriously!

source_zh: 好好见识一下，在下的信念吧！
虽属僭越，但容在下用刀测试一下你的信念吧
target_en: Forgive my presumption, but allow me to test your conviction with my blade.

source_zh: 现在正是在战场上展现胸中“信心”的时机
target_en: Now is the time to demonstrate the "confidence" in your heart on the battlefield.

source_zh: 我没办法手下留情了喔
我会按照自己的风格，想怎么做就怎么做
target_en: I'll do things my own way, however I want.

source_zh: 你没有未来。就在这里丧命吧
target_en: You have no future. Die here and now.

source_zh: 你应该知道..挡在我前面代表什么吧
target_en: You should know... what it means to stand in my way.

source_zh: 手臂..身体蠢蠢欲动..来吧..快点开始吧
target_en: My arms... my body... they're itching for action... Come on... let's start already...

source_zh: 找上门的挑战就必须彻底解决
target_en: A challenge that comes knocking must be settled completely.
My turn to take the stage.

source_zh: 太过美丽就会成为嫉妒与羡慕的目标啊！
target_en: Such beauty invites nothing but envy and jealousy!

source_zh: 不用废话，痛扁一顿就对了！
